detail: Beyond my passions in exploring the intersection of computational systems and social interaction, other areas of interest are in machine learning and building for the Blockchain.
🎊 completing my undergraduate de`gree in Computer Science at **[UC Santa Cruz](https://engineering.ucsc.edu/)**, Class of 2021

🌐 building **[dapps](https://ethereum.org/en/dapps/#what-are-dapps)** and **[Smart Contracts](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/smart-contracts/)** using React.JS, ReduxObservable, and Solidity++
